means: 发誓抛弃( forswear的过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: While China has forsworn communist economics, it is still excessively favouring investment over consumption.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管中国已经放弃了社会主义经济, 但它仍过度偏爱投资而非消费.

sentence.Network_en: TITANIA What , jealous Oberon ! Fairies, skip hence ; I have forsworn his bed and company.
sentence.Network_cn: 提泰妮娅:嘿, 嫉妒的奥布朗! 神仙们, 快快走开; 我已经发誓不和他同游同寝了.

特殊的过去分词有哪些?_百度知道 ... 抛弃 forsook forsaken 发假誓 forswore forsworn 冷冻 froze frozen.

entry.def: If you forswear something, you promise that you will stop doing it, having it, or using it.

example.ex: The party was offered a share of government if it forswore violence.
example.tran: 该党如果宣誓放弃暴力就可以参与执政。

auth_sentence.content: He played the old stuff, with an indulgence that the Dead had at that time forsworn.
auth_sentence.res_content: He played the old stuff, with an indulgence that the Dead had at that time forsworn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He played the old stuff, with an indulgence that the Dead had at that time forsworn.

auth_sentence.content: Was this the reason, too, that she had forsworn conventional treatment for her disease?
auth_sentence.res_content: Was this the reason, too, that she had forsworn conventional treatment for her disease?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was this the reason, too, that she had forsworn conventional treatment for her disease?
